languages.text: "Однажды Висирь зашивал нам, юным ткачам, глаза, дабы мы узрели истину". {n}Голос Кибеллы звучит глухо, но в глазах тлеет ярость.{/n} "Наш ритуал был исполнен служения Ему. Закалял и готовил к исполнению долга. Но вы творите гнусную ересь, кощунственную пародию на наши святые практики".

traits.locale_text: "Однажды Висирь зашивал нам, юным ткачам, глаза, дабы мы узрели истину". {n}Голос Кибеллы звучит глухо, но в глазах тлеет ярость.{/n} "Наш ритуал был исполнен служения Ему. Закалял и готовил к исполнению долга. Но вы творите гнусную ересь, кощунственную пародию на наши святые практики".

languages.text: "I remember when the Vizsier used to sew our eyes shut so that His young spinners would see the truth." {n}Kibellah's voice sounds hollow, but there are glowing embers of fury in her eyes.{/n} "Our ritual was one of service to Him. It tempered and prepared us for our duty. What you are working here is despicable heresy, a blasphemous mockery of our sacred disciplines."
languages.original_text: "Однажды Висирь зашивал нам, юным ткачам, глаза, дабы мы узрели истину". {n}Голос Кибеллы звучит глухо, но в глазах тлеет ярость.{/n} "Наш ритуал был исполнен служения Ему. Закалял и готовил к исполнению долга. Но вы творите гнусную ересь, кощунственную пародию на наши святые практики".

It tempered and prepared us for our duty. What you are working here is despicable heresy, a blasphemous mockery of our sacred disciplines."

It tempered and prepared us for our duty. What you are working here is despicable heresy, a blasphemous mockery of our sacred disciplines."

It tempered and prepared us for our duty. What you are working here is despicable heresy, a blasphemous mockery of our sacred disciplines."

It tempered and prepared us for our duty. What you are working here is despicable heresy, a blasphemous mockery of our sacred disciplines."

"I remember when the Vizsier used to sew our eyes shut so that His young spinners would see the truth." {n}Kibellah's voice sounds hollow, but there are glowing embers of fury in her eyes.{/n} "Our ritual was one of service to Him. It tempered and prepared us for our duty. What you are working here is despicable heresy, a blasphemous mockery of our sacred disciplines."

languages.text: «Recuerdo cuando el Visir nos cosía los ojos para que Sus jóvenes tejedores vieran la verdad». {n}La voz de Kibellah suena carente de sentimientos, pero en sus ojos brillan brasas de furia.{/n} «Nuestro ritual era un servicio para Él. Nos templaba y preparaba para nuestro deber. Lo que está haciendo usted aquí es una herejía despreciable, una burla blasfema hacia nuestras sagradas disciplinas».
languages.original_text: "I remember when the Vizsier used to sew our eyes shut so that His young spinners would see the truth." {n}Kibellah's voice sounds hollow, but there are glowing embers of fury in her eyes.{/n} "Our ritual was one of service to Him. It tempered and prepared us for our duty. What you are working here is despicable heresy, a blasphemous mockery of our sacred disciplines."

traits.locale_text: «Recuerdo cuando el Visir nos cosía los ojos para que Sus jóvenes tejedores vieran la verdad». {n}La voz de Kibellah suena carente de sentimientos, pero en sus ojos brillan brasas de furia.{/n} «Nuestro ritual era un servicio para Él. Nos templaba y preparaba para nuestro deber. Lo que está haciendo usted aquí es una herejía despreciable, una burla blasfema hacia nuestras sagradas disciplinas».

languages.text: 「若き織り手たちが真実を見ることができるよう、ヴィジールが我々の目を縫っていたのを覚えています」{n}キベラの声は虚ろに聞こえるが、彼女の目には怒りの炎が燃えていた。{/n}「我らの儀式は、主への奉仕のひとつでした。儀式は我らを鍛え、任務の準備をさせるものです。あなた方がここで行おうとしていることは卑劣な異端であり、我らの神聖な規律を冒涜するものです」
languages.original_text: "I remember when the Vizsier used to sew our eyes shut so that His young spinners would see the truth." {n}Kibellah's voice sounds hollow, but there are glowing embers of fury in her eyes.{/n} "Our ritual was one of service to Him. It tempered and prepared us for our duty. What you are working here is despicable heresy, a blasphemous mockery of our sacred disciplines."

traits.locale_text: 「若き織り手たちが真実を見ることができるよう、ヴィジールが我々の目を縫っていたのを覚えている」 {n}キベラの声は虚ろに聞こえるが、彼女の目には怒りの炎が燃えていた。{/n}「我らの儀式は、主への奉仕のひとつでした。儀式は我らを鍛え、任務の準備をさせるものです。あなた方がここで行おうとしていることは卑劣な異端であり、私たちの神聖な規律を冒涜するものです」

languages.text: “我还记得，宿老曾把我们的眼睛缝起来，让祂年轻的织网者看到真理。”{n}尽管绮贝菈的声音听起来很空洞，但她的双眼中却闪烁着愤怒的余烬。{/n}“我们的仪式是为了侍奉祂。这样的仪式锤炼了我们，让我们做好了履行职责的准备。可你举行的仪式却是卑鄙的异端恶行，是在嘲弄、亵渎我们的神圣戒律。”
languages.original_text: "I remember when the Vizsier used to sew our eyes shut so that His young spinners would see the truth." {n}Kibellah's voice sounds hollow, but there are glowing embers of fury in her eyes.{/n} "Our ritual was one of service to Him. It tempered and prepared us for our duty. What you are working here is despicable heresy, a blasphemous mockery of our sacred disciplines."

traits.locale_text: “我还记得，宿老曾把我们的眼睛缝起来，让祂年轻的织网者看到真理。”{n}尽管绮贝菈的声音听起来很空洞，但她的双眼中却闪烁着愤怒的余烬。{/n}“我们的仪式是为了侍奉祂。这样的仪式锤炼了我们，让我们做好了履行职责的准备。可你举行的仪式却是卑鄙的异端恶行，是在嘲弄、亵渎我们的神圣戒律。”

languages.text: "Ich weiß noch, wie der Wesir unsere Augen vernähte, damit Seine jungen Spinner die Wahrheit sehen." {n}Kibellahs Stimme klingt hohl, aber in ihren Augen funkelt ein wütender Glanz.{/n} "Unser Ritual sollte Ihm dienen. Es bereitete uns auf unseren Dienst vor. Was Ihr hier betreibt, ist eine widerwärtige Ketzerei, eine blasphemische Verhöhnung unserer heiligen Disziplinen."
languages.original_text: "I remember when the Vizsier used to sew our eyes shut so that His young spinners would see the truth." {n}Kibellah's voice sounds hollow, but there are glowing embers of fury in her eyes.{/n} "Our ritual was one of service to Him. It tempered and prepared us for our duty. What you are working here is despicable heresy, a blasphemous mockery of our sacred disciplines."

traits.locale_text: "Ich weiß noch, wie der Wesir unsere Augen vernähte, damit Seine jungen Spinner die Wahrheit sehen." {n}Kibellahs Stimme klingt hohl, aber in ihren Augen funkelt ein wütender Glanz.{/n} "Unser Ritual sollte Ihm dienen. Es bereitete uns auf unseren Dienst vor. Was Ihr hier betreibt, ist eine widerwärtige Ketzerei, eine blasphemische Verhöhnung unserer heiligen Disziplinen."

languages.text: « Je me rappelle que le vizir nous cousait les yeux afin que Ses jeunes tisseurs découvrent la vérité. » {n}Si la voix de Kibellah est calme, les braises de la fureur dansent dans ses prunelles.{/n} « Notre rituel était consacré à Son service. Il forgeait nos âmes et nous préparait à accomplir notre devoir. Ce qui se trame ici est une hérésie répugnante, un travestissement sacrilège de nos disciplines sacrées. »
languages.original_text: "I remember when the Vizsier used to sew our eyes shut so that His young spinners would see the truth." {n}Kibellah's voice sounds hollow, but there are glowing embers of fury in her eyes.{/n} "Our ritual was one of service to Him. It tempered and prepared us for our duty. What you are working here is despicable heresy, a blasphemous mockery of our sacred disciplines."

traits.locale_text: « Je me rappelle que le vizir nous cousait les yeux afin que Ses jeunes tisseurs découvrent la vérité. » {n}Si la voix de Kibellah est calme, les braises de la fureur dansent dans ses prunelles.{/n} « Notre rituel était consacré à Son service. Il forgeait nos âmes et nous préparait à accomplir notre devoir. Ce qui se trame ici est une hérésie répugnante, un travestissement sacrilège de nos disciplines sacrées. »

languages.text: "Genç dokurlar hakikati görebilsin diye Vezir'in eskiden gözlerimizi dikerek kapattığını hatırlıyorum." {n}Kibellah'nın sesi, kulağa duygusuz geliyor. Ancak gözlerindeki öfke, kor gibi parıldıyor.{/n} "Ayinimiz, O'na hizmet yöntemlerimizden biriydi. Bizi güçlendirip vazifeye hazırladı. Burada yaptığınız hakir kâfirlikten ibaret. Kutsal disiplinlerimizi hürmet bilmeden alaya alıyorsunuz."
languages.original_text: "I remember when the Vizsier used to sew our eyes shut so that His young spinners would see the truth." {n}Kibellah's voice sounds hollow, but there are glowing embers of fury in her eyes.{/n} "Our ritual was one of service to Him. It tempered and prepared us for our duty. What you are working here is despicable heresy, a blasphemous mockery of our sacred disciplines."
